info.name: Wider Google+
info.description: This style moves some stuff around on your Google+ stream, making posts wider, and moves the stuff on the right (You may know, Trending on Google+, etc) to the top of the page.
info.additionalInfo: This version was created July 7, 2012. I had created this style a while back, but Google keeps changing their formats, so I had to completely re-write it.
